Package org.melior.service.web.rest

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExceptionPayload
    The standard payload which is returned to a client application by the configured ExceptionHandler when an exception has occurred and the exception has propagated out of the Controller that handled the HTTP REST request from the client application.
    RestRequestInterceptor
    Intercepts any HTTP REST requests which are received by the application and routes them past the configured WorkManager to allow the WorkManager to control the flow of requests through the application.
    RestService
    A base class for service implementations that handle HTTP REST requests.
    RestServiceAutoConfiguration
    Installs an interceptor which routes HTTP REST requests past the configured WorkManager to allow the WorkManager to control the flow of requests through the application.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RestInterfaceException
    An application should raise this exception in the top-level methods of a Controller that handles HTTP REST requests from client applications.
